sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./SearchResults.css"; function SearchResults() { const mockResults = [ { id: 1, company: "Evergreen Transport Ltd", type: "12, Exclusive Sleeper Bus-AL12M, AC", route: "CHP—RAJ—DHK via Nabinagar ◦ Savar ◦ Gabtoli ◦ Kallyanpur", departTime: "11:30 PM", departDate: "Thu, 15 May", departCity: "Rajshahi", arrivalTime: "05:00 AM", arrivalDate: "Fri, 16 May", arrivalCity: "Dhaka", price: 1100, seats: 30, }, ]; return (
{mockResults.map((bus) => (
{bus.company}

{bus.type}

Route: {bus.route}

{bus.departTime}

{bus.departDate}

{bus.departCity}

5h 30m

{bus.arrivalTime}

{bus.arrivalDate}

{bus.arrivalCity}

৳{bus.price}

{bus.seats} Seat(s) Available

Cancellation Policy Boarding Point Dropping Point Amenities
))}
); }
